title: Big and small
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and Dick Larson
brief_description: Develops the concepts of comparative size by illustrating how children may measure common articles in relation to their own body size as well as by standard measuring units. Suitable for primary grade children.
description: Develops the concepts of comparative size by illustrating how children may measure common articles in relation to their own body size as well as by standard measuring units. Suitable for primary grade children.
